title: Timeout
description: Timeout (noun): An interrupt signal generated by a program or device that has waited a certain length of time for some input, but has not received it.Brina Kingston and billionaire Luke Maxwell have decided that if they want their relationship to work, there has to be more to it than amazing sex. They’ve agreed to take a timeout for thirty days to work on being friends.Brina believes this is her last chance to show Luke how serious she is about him, but his devastating charm and hot body are testing her will.Luke Maxwell is determined to see this timeout through to the end, but Brina’s advances have him seeking a cold shower.Will Brina and Luke's plan ignite a fire that lasts a lifetime or will their flame flicker out?
author: Cassia Leo
